docs.lead_paragraph: School kids, truckers, marijuana smokers and fans of old-fashioned light bulbs are among the millions of people who had something extra riding on the big spending bill passed by Congress to keep the government running.

headline.main: The $1.1T Bill: School Lunches, Light Bulbs, Pot
headline.print_headline: The $1.1T Bill: School Lunches, Light Bulbs, Pot

docs.snippet: School kids, truckers, marijuana smokers and fans of old-fashioned light bulbs are among the millions of people who had something extra riding on the big spending bill passed by Congress to keep the government running.

docs.lead_paragraph: The $1.1 trillion package that cleared the Senate over the weekend was, like many of its predecessors, filled with provisions to satisfy special interests.

headline.main: In Final Spending Bill, Salty Food and Belching Cows Are Winners
headline.print_headline: In Final Spending Bill, Salty Food and Belching Cows are Winners

docs.abstract: Senate clears $1.1 trillion spending package that is once again filled with provisions to satisfy special interests; riders include major victories for companies that provide food for school lunches, cattle farmers, Blue Cross and Blue Shield, Las Vegas casinos and several others; bill is headed to Pres Obama for his signature.
docs.snippet: The $1.1 trillion package that cleared the Senate over the weekend was, like many of its predecessors, filled with provisions to satisfy special interests.

keywords.value: Blue Cross and Blue Shield Assn
keywords.name: organizations
